group_1.textLeft: I'm better now.@Sorry for worrying you.

group_1.textRight: …Is this what they were talking about@when they say you get possessed?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… Sometimes it just happens.
What do you guys make of this?

group_1.textRight: …It's gotta be a symptom of some sorta illness.

group_1.textLeft: And I guess you wouldn't know what@that could be…?

group_1.textRight: …Nah, but from what I can tell,@it's something serious.
Like…maybe something affecting her brain.

group_1.textLeft: …And in this era, if something's wrong@with your brain…

group_1.textRight: But…we know Toyo does succeed the throne,@so things shouldn't get too much worse.

group_1.textLeft: …I sure hope so.

group_1.textRight: …Are you sure you're okay?

group_1.textLeft: Definitely.
…Um…I guess I made you guys see something@really disgusting, huh…?

group_1.textRight: That's not true at all.

group_1.textLeft: Nahaha… You guys are so kind…
But I know you guys actually feel really@creeped out and scared…
And I…

group_1.textRight: …I already told you.@That's not true at all.

group_1.textLeft: Nahaha…
…But still, the villagers must completely@hate me now.
It's what I deserve.

group_1.textRight: …"It's what you deserve?"@Why do you think that?

group_1.textLeft: Why…? 'Cause it's always been like this.
This keeps happening, but I just gotta keep@doing my best.
If I lose all hope, that's when I'll really be cursed.

group_1.textRight: Hellooo!@Rena? Momoko? Kaede?

group_1.textCenter: …Where'd they all go?@I haven't seen 'em around this morning…

group_1.textLeft: Just stop and listen to us for a moment.

group_1.textRight: You were around that cursed child, right?!
Don't come get any closer!@Or we'll be possessed too!

group_1.textLeft: She's not cursed!@She's just sick…

group_1.textRight: Stop talking nonsense!@Leave me alone!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, wait…!

group_1.textCenter: Good grief. I guess the people in this era don't@get it when you say this stuff's caused by illness.

group_1.textRight: We wanted to try helping you somehow,@in whatever little way we could.

group_1.textLeft: Kaede…

group_1.textRight: We were trying to clear the air with the villagers@so you could focus on your test…
That's right, Rena came up with the idea.

group_1.textLeft: Rena did…?

group_1.textRight: I-I don't need your help…

group_1.textLeft: I'm here to tell you that Toyo isn't possessed.
Look…Toyo can be a little quirky,@and she can get carried away easily…
But she's never made trouble for anyone.
She's done nothing wrong.

group_1.textRight: But—! The curse…!

group_1.textLeft: Don't just go automatically blaming her!
…Everyone keeps calling her the child of a@Cursed God, and I just don't get it.
All she's ever wanted is to be with everyone,@but she couldn't have that, so she put up with it…
But even then…even after all that, Toyo…
She says all she wants is to make@everyone happy.
Do you really think someone like@that could be cursed?!
…And before I go, I've been wanting to say this@for a long time.
STOP TALKING SHIT ABOUT MY FRIENDS!
*Gasp*

group_1.textRight: I'm glad…she was able to express that@so freely.

group_1.textLeft: I'm…her friend?

group_1.textRight: Yes, and I'm your friend, too.
…Or maybe not?

group_1.textLeft: …No, it's not that…it's just, I…I thought@that I would never make any friends…
That I would just… I thought I was gonna@be alone forever and ever…

group_1.textRight: Yeah…

group_1.textLeft: But hearing you guys say otherwise…@That makes me…so happy…
Ah, ah… That's weird…@I'm happy, so why am I crying?

group_1.textRight: Yeah…

group_1.textLeft: Nahahaha, c'mon, Kaede…@Wh-why are you crying, too? This is so weird…

group_1.textRight: You did great, Toyo.

group_1.textLeft: …Nnh… Nngh…

group_1.narration: When I started bawling,@even Kaede joined in.
Then Rena and Momoko came along,@and for some reason, all of us were crying.
I used to think that it was wrong to cry,@that people shouldn't cry…until that very moment.
Now…@With every tear that falls...@It feels like something's being washed away…
